title: Spacious 4BR/3BA Home for Rent
posting_body: ['Beautiful, well-kept 4 bedroom/3 full bathroom split-level home in the sough-after Valhalla school district is available for rent immediately.', 'It’s situated on a wonderful, quiet tree-lined street in one of the best neighborhoods.', 'This spacious home features a large, beautifully landscaped private backyard that includes watershed property at the back, a finished downstairs with kitchenette, fireplace, and separate entrance.', 'The upstairs master bedroom features an attached full bath, and walk-in closet.', 'An eat-in kitchen with granite countertops, a new stainless-steel dishwasher, and a private enclosed back deck that is accessible via the dining room and the kitchen.', 'The downstairs is attractive as an office, a play space, in-law or au-pair suite with lots of storage spaces.', ' Complete with central A/C, 2 zone heat, a fireplace, laundry in the home, 2 car attached garage with additional driveway space, hardwood floors and a bonus room.', 'The home is in the quaint village of Valhalla, with the Metro North Station and Kensico Dam Plaza within walking distance.', 'It’s just a 40 minute ride to Manhattan, and 8 minutes to White Plains.', ' It is also a close distance to shops, schools, town pool, rec.', 'center, and library.']
